response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, and we believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to both parties, we propose a transaction price of $800,000. This figure reflects a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and its potential benefits to you. We are confident that this offer will allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to discussing this opportunity with you.", "product_price": 800000}
